alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 6:56PM MST until March 05 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Heber- Overgaard and Williams. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. Another round of snow is likely later Saturday into Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Additional snow forecast from 6 PM Today to 5 AM Saturday: Doney Park 0 to 1 inches Flagstaff 1 to 3 inches Forest Lakes 3 to 5 inches Heber-Overgaard 0 to 1 inches Williams 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim
